summary:
Changed the Chaos Damage enchantment to do Fire, Shock and Frost damage every time it hits.
Also changed the cost per hit which means you can use it a hell of a lot of times  before it needs to be recharged
descriptionHtml:
Changed the \"Fire Damage\", \"Frost Damage\" and \"Shock Damage\" to 100 and the \"Enchantment cost\" to 1 in the following:
DLC2EnchWeaponChaosDamageBase
DLC2EnchWeaponChaosDamage03
DLC2EnchWeaponChaosDamage04
DLC2EnchWeaponChaosDamage05
DLC2EnchWeaponChaosDamage06
author: Cheats McGee
